bandcalc¶

bandcalc.lattice.generate.generate_k_path(points, N)¶

Interpolate between points with N steps

Parameters

  • points (numpy.ndarray) – points to interpolate between

  • N (int) – sample number

Return type

numpy.ndarray

bandcalc.lattice.generate.generate_lattice(lattice_basis, size)¶

Combine lattice basis vectors size times to generate a lattice

Parameters

  • lattice_basis (numpy.ndarray) – basis vectors of the lattice

  • size (int) – maximum coefficient size

Return type

numpy.ndarray

bandcalc.lattice.generate.generate_lattice_by_shell(lattice_basis, shell)¶

Generate lattice from basis vectors with shell shells around the zero vector

Parameters

  • lattice_basis (numpy.ndarray) – basis vectors of the lattice

  • shell (int) – number of shells

Return type

numpy.ndarray

bandcalc.lattice.generate.generate_moire_lattice_by_shell(lattice_basis1, lattice_basis2, twist_angle, shell)¶

Generate a twisted moire lattice from two sets of basis vectors

Parameters

  • lattice_basis1 (numpy.ndarray) – lattice basis of first lattice

  • lattice_basis2 (numpy.ndarray) – lattice basis of second lattice

  • twist_angle (float) – twist angle

Shell

number of shells to calculate

Return type

numpy.ndarray

bandcalc.lattice.generate.generate_monkhorst_pack_set(lattice_basis, q)¶

Generate a folded Monkhorst-Pack set, which only fills the first Brillouin zone.

Parameters

  • lattice_basis (numpy.ndarray) – lattice basis

  • q (int) – lattice density (see the original paper)

Return type

numpy.ndarray

bandcalc.lattice.generate.generate_rotation_matrix(angle, degrees=True)¶

Generate a 2D rotation matrix for given angle

Parameters

  • angle (float) – the angle to rotate by

  • degrees (bool) – if angle is given in degrees or not (radians)

Return type

numpy.ndarray

bandcalc.lattice.generate.group_lattice_vectors_by_length(lattice)¶

Group an array of vectors by length

Parameters

lattice (numpy.ndarray) – vectors to group

Return type

dict[float, numpy.ndarray]

bandcalc.lattice.generate.rotate_lattice(lattice, angle, degrees=True)¶

Rotate a 2D lattice by angle

Parameters

  • lattice (numpy.ndarray) – lattice to rotate

  • angle (float) – the angle to rotate by

  • degrees (bool) – if angle is given in degrees or not (radians)

Return type

numpy.ndarray
